name: Cherry in the Sky
description: Take your umbrella and soar the skies! Chase the evil princess's flying castle and rescue your kidnapped sister in Cherry in the Sky.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel Core™ 2 Duo 2.0+ GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB Video Card DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible Additional Notes: Supports Microsoft® Xbox One controller, DualShock®4 controller or Direct Input compatible controller
